mapper.select: SELECT ta.id, ta.title, ta.summary, tc.name as categoryName, tc.id as categoryId, ta.thumbnail, ta.view_count as viewCount, ta.create_time as createTime, ta.content from t_article ta INNER JOIN t_category tc on tc.id = ta.category_id WHERE ta.status = '0' and ta.del_flag = 0 and ta.id = #{id}
